translation: Having seen Thy mouths fearful with teeth blazing like the fires of cosmic dissolution, I know not the four quarters, nor do I find peace. Have mercy, O Lord of the gods, O abode of the universe.
commentary: 11.25 fearful with teeth? f and? And Thy? Mukhani mouths? seeing having seen? Eve even? blazing like Pralayafires? directions the four arters? Not not? know know? Not not? Labhe do (I) obtain? f and? Shame peace? Please have mercy? Devesh O Lord of the gods? Jagannivasa O abode of the universe.Commentary Jagannivasa The substratum of the universe.Kalanala The fires which consume the
